provider.name: singleplatform
provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Killer Nachos
items.description: A generous portion of tortilla chips topped with refried beans, chile verde, home-made chorizo, melted jack cheese, pico de gallo, guacamole, sour cream, black olives, green onions and jalapenos

items.name: Vegetarian Killer Nachos
items.description: Same delicious ingredients refried beans, chile verde, home-made chorizo, melted jack cheese, pico de gallo, guacamole, sour cream, black olives, green onions and jalapenos without the meat

items.name: Nachos Regulares
items.description: Home-made tortilla chips topped with refried beans and melted cheese, garnished with jalapenos, sour cream, olives and tomatoes

items.name: Fresh Guacamole with Chips
items.description: Avocado blended with tomato, onion, serranos and cilantro

items.name: Rajas De Chile Poblano Con Queso
items.description: Roasted poblano chile strips with sauteed sliced tomatoes and onions, melted jack cheese, served with your choice of tortillas

items.name: Hongos Al Ajillo
items.description: Mushrooms saut√©ed with garlic, butter, white wine and crushed red chile

items.name: Encurtidos
items.description: Four pickled jalapenos filled with shrimp and queso fresco, dipped in egg batter, fried and topped with salsa espanola, served with guacamole

items.name: Chile Con Queso
items.description: Anaheim chile, fresh jalapenos, onions and tomato cooked with two types of cheese

items.name: Ramon's Quesadilla San Francisco
items.description: A grilled flour tortilla filled with carne asada, jack cheese, sliced black olives, pico de gallo, jalapeno, avocado slices and sour cream. accompanied by a fresh cabbage salad

items.name: Bay Shrimp Quesadilla
items.description: Grilled bay shrimp seasoned with lemon, pepper and melted jack cheese, garnished with sour cream

items.name: Appetizers - Quesadillas
items.description: Garnished With Guacamole. A 10" Flour Tortilla Generously Filled With Your Choice Of:

items.name: Cheese and Rajas De Chile Poblano, Onion and Tomatoes
Sopa De Frijol Negro
items.description: A puree of black bean soup with a hint of crema mexicana and crisp tortilla garnish

items.name: Sopa De Queso, Maria's Favorite Soup
items.description: Anaheim chiles, diced potatoes, tomatoes, onions and garlic simmered in a light broth garnished with jack cheese and crema mexicana

items.name: Chicken Salad a La Mexicana
items.description: Chopped chicken breast blended with chipotle chiles, pecans, mayonnaise and a hint of mustard. served in a lettuce bowl with avocado slices

items.name: Red Iguana Dinner Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce with diced nopales, tomatoes and cotija cheese tossed with your choice of homemade salad dressing

items.name: Shrimp Sonora
items.description: Seven large tiger prawns sauteed in garlic and butter with lemon and a hint of pepper. served with mexican white rice, black beans, & tortillas

items.name: Pescado a La Veracruzana
items.description: Fresh fish of the day dusted with flour, paprika and sesame seeds, pan fried and then simmered in a flavorful tomato sauce with jalapeno strips, garlic, onions, oregano, capers and green olives. served with grilled pineapple and rice of the day

items.name: Ramon's Famous Fish Tacos
items.description: Fresh grilled tuna served in soft corn tortillas garnished with fresh seasoned cabbage, cucumber salsa & limes, served with spanish rice

items.name: Parrillada
items.description: For seafood lovers an exquisite dish: grilled lobster, shrimp, scallops, tuna and crab topped with melted cheese. garnished with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, jalapenos and melted butter on the side. served with spanish rice

items.name: Steaks
items.description: These Dishes Are Complemented With Flour Or Corn Tortillas

items.name: Encebollado
items.description: A 10 oz. new york steak, grilled and topped with sauteed onions, tossed with chorizo. served with rice and beans

items.name: Steak a La Ranchera
items.description: Tender cubes of new york steak, grilled and cooked with our special sauce of green chiles, fresh tomatoes and potatoes. served with rice and beans

items.name: Carne Asada a La Tampiquena
items.description: A traditional dish from the port of tampico. a 10 oz. new york steak, cheese enchilada, refried beans, garnished with guacamole

items.name: Pollo a La Moreliana
items.description: Skinless / boneless chicken marinated in white wine and spices, lightly browned then simmered with tomatoes, onions, chiles serranos, chile guero, potatoes, carrots and zucchini. served with our rice of the day and tortillas

items.name: Cochinita Pibil
items.description: Pork loin rubbed with achiote, vinegar, lime juice, orange juice, paprika and salt, slow roasted, then shredded and simmered in the roasting juice. served with black beans, rice of the day and tortillas

items.name: Puntas De Filete a La Nortena
items.description: Top sirloin tips sauteed with bacon, jalapenos strips, onions and fresh tomatoes, served atop the almond mole. refried beans and tortillas complete this much loved dish

items.name: Mole
items.description: A Gastronomical Delight Of Authentic Mexican Flavor! Mole (pronounced Moh-lay) Is A Sauce Made Of Dried And Fresh Chiles, Nuts, Spices, Herbs, Fruits And Vegetables. Delight In Red Iguana's Interpretation Of Mexico's National Dish. All Mole Dishes Served With Spanish Rice, Refried Beans And Tortillas. Mole Sauces Are Available To Go

items.name: Mole Amarillo
items.description: Golden raisins, yellow tomatoes, yellow zucchini, chile guajillo and dried seasonal yellow chiles, makes this mole a fiery favorite-tossed with chicken

items.name: Mole Coloradito
items.description: Pine nuts, almonds, peanuts, dried chile chiuacle and guajillo chiles, blended with fresh chile poblano and mexican chocolate-served over grilled pork loin

items.name: Mole Poblano
items.description: Puebla's beloved mole. guajillo ancho dried chiles, peanuts, sesame seeds, walnuts, raisins, bananas and mexican chocolate-tossed with turkey

items.name: Mole Verde
items.description: Fresh chile poblano, chile guero and jalapeno, blended with pepitas, sesame seeds, basil, onions, zucchini, avocados-tossed with turkey or chicken

items.name: Mole Negro
items.description: The king of moles. dried chile mulato, negro pasilla, mexican chocolate, raisins, peanuts, walnuts & bananas-tossed with chicken or turkey

items.name: Red Pipian
items.description: A pumpkin seed sauce made with dried chile guajillo, peanuts, pepitas, onions, tomatoes, tossed with chicken

items.name: Lomo De Puerco En Mole De Almendras
items.description: Almonds, chile guajillo, chile guero, yellow zucchini, milk, peanut butter and onions, served with a roasted pork loin stuffed with dried fruit, sun-dried tomatoes, swiss chard and pine nuts

items.name: Red Iguana
items.description: One-cheese enchilada, a taco a la iguana, a beef flauta topped with guacamole and sour cream, a chile relleno and a beef tostada complete our special combo plate

items.name: Poblano Plate
items.description: One sour cream chicken enchilada, taco a la iguana, beef tostada and a side of guacamole

items.name: Tapatio Plate
items.description: One chicken, beef or cheese enchilada, chile relleno and beef or chicken flauta topped with sour cream and guacamole

items.name: Iguana Plate
items.description: One chicken, beef or cheese enchilada, chile relleno, hard-shell beef taco with rice and beans

items.name: Mexican Plate
items.description: One chile verde burrito, hard-shell beef taco, beef tostada with rice and beans

items.name: Papadzules
items.description: Two corn tortillas filled with sliced boiled egg and pipian, topped with mole verde, a bit of salsa espanola, finished with melted jack cheese and garnished with sliced pickled red onions

items.name: Enmoladas
items.description: Three corn tortillas folded into triangles and filled with refried beans, topped with mole negro, sprinkled with a blend of queso fresco and cotija then topped with pickled red onions

items.name: Enchiladas Potosinas (4)
items.description: An empanada-style enchilada made of corn masa, filled with queso fresco, green onions and crushed red chile, grilled, fried, topped with melted jack cheese and sprinkled with green onions

items.name: Gringas (2)
items.description: Tender tips of carne adobada grilled with pineapple, sliced green, red and yellow bell peppers, tomatoes and onions, folded in a warm flour tortilla

items.name: Chile Verde
items.description: Tender select cubed pork cooked in our green chile and tomatillo sauce. served with rice, refried beans and tortillas

items.name: Chile Colorado
items.description: Diced top sirloin seasoned and simmered in a dried new mexico chile and tomato puree sauce

items.name: Chile Rellenos
items.description: Two anaheim peppers stuffed with jack cheese, fried in egg batter and topped with our salsa espanola. served with rice, refried beans and tortillas

items.name: Carnitas
items.description: Tender pieces of succulent pork cooked in its own juices, with spice and orange pulp, then fried with beer and a hint of milk

items.name: Fajitas
items.description: Your choice of grilled top sirloin, chicken or shrimp served sizzling on a platter with onions and peppers. pico de gallo, guacamole and a jalapeno finish this popular dish. topped with hot flour tortillas

items.name: Huevos Rancheros
items.description: A mexican favorite! two eggs topped with salsa ranchera and jack cheese. served with rice, refried beans and tortillas

items.name: Huevos Con Chorizo
items.description: Home-made pork chorizo scrambled with eggs. served with rice, refried beans and tortillas

items.name: Monterrey Plate
items.description: Machaca con huevo (shredded beef scrambled with eggs seasoned with bell peppers) , served with double refried pinto beans sprinkled with a blend of queso cotija and queso fresco. served with tortillas

items.name: Chilaquiles
items.description: Tortilla chips fried with home-made chorizo, egg, salsa espanola and mole poblano. sprinkled with queso cotija and queso fresco and green onions garnished with crema mexicana and 2 avocado slices. served with refried beans

items.name: Sunrise Burritos
items.description: Two chile verde pork burritos smothered in chile verde, then topped with melted cheese and two fried eggs

items.name: Enchiladas a La Lago Salado
items.description: In honor of salt lake city! two corn tortillas filled with potatoes and chorizo topped with our traditional enchilada sauce, melted jack cheese, sour cream and accompanied by a chicken salad a la mexicana lettuce wrap

items.name: Enchiladas Rancheras
items.description: Jack cheese wrapped in two corn tortillas topped with a mountain of sauteed mushrooms, salsa ranchera and more melted jack cheese

items.name: Red Iguana Traditional Enchiladas (2)
items.description: Shredded beef, chicken or cheese enchiladas in corn tortillas, topped with our home-made enchilada sauce of new mexico dried chile and melted jack cheese

items.name: Entomatadas
items.description: Two sour cream chicken enchiladas topped with salsa espanola, melted jack cheese and jalapenos

items.name: Enchiladas Poblanas
items.description: Two sour cream cheese enchiladas topped with our traditional enchilada sauce, melted jack cheese, avocado slices and a dollop of sour cream

items.name: Enchiladas Suizas (2)
items.description: Avocado slices and sour cream chicken topped with mole poblano and melted jack cheese. one of our more popular dishes

items.name: Enchiladas Verdes
items.description: Two sour cream chicken enchiladas topped with mole verde and melted jack cheese. garnished with green onions, diced tomatoes and black olives

items.name: Enchiladas Amarillas
items.description: Two enchiladas stuffed with pork carnitas topped with mole amarillo, melted jack cheese and drizzled with crema mexicana

items.name: Tacos Don Ramon
items.description: Three crisp corn tacos filled with tender top sirloin tips, grilled with pork chorizo, garnished with shredded lettuce and queso cotija, served with pico de gallo and a salsa de aguacate

items.name: Tacos De Machaca Con Huevo
items.description: Three soft corn tacos filled with seasoned shredded beef, bell peppers and egg. served with guacamole. pico de gallo and refried beans

items.name: Tacos a La Iguana
items.description: Three crisp corn tacos with shredded beef, melted jack cheese and sour cream, served with guacamole and refried beans

items.name: Tacos De Carne Asada
items.description: Three soft corn tacos filled with grilled top sirloin tips. served with pico de gallo, a tangy tomato salsa and refried beans

items.name: Tacos De Pollo
items.description: Three crisp corn tacos with seasoned chicken, cooked with onions, tomato sauce garnished with melted jack cheese, served with guacamole and refried beans

items.name: Flautas (2)
items.description: A blend of corn and flour tortillas filled with chicken or shredded beef, rolled and deep fried, topped with guacamole and sour cream. served with rice and refried beans

items.name: Red Iguana Traditional Tacos
items.description: Two hard-shell corn tacos with shredded beef, chicken or guacamole garnished with lettuce, sauce, cheese and tomatoes

items.name: Vegetarian Chimichanga (1)
items.description: A flour tortilla filled with sauteed vegetables, deep-fried, topped with salsa espanola, melted jack cheese, sour cream and guacamole

items.name: Machaca Chimichanga (1)
items.description: Shredded beef with egg encased in a flour tortilla, deep fried, topped with salsa espanola, melted jack cheese, sour cream and guacamole

items.name: Chimichanga Original
items.description: Your choice of chile verde, chicken or shredded beef, wrapped in a flour tortilla, deep-fried, topped with salsa espanola, melted jack cheese, sour cream and guacamole

items.name: Burtios Buenos
items.description: Enchilada Style: Our Homemade Enchilada Sauce With Melted Jack Cheese

items.name: Chile Verde Burritos (2)
items.description: Refried beans and our home-made pork chile verde wrapped in a flour tortilla, topped with a little more chile verde

items.name: Machaca Burritos (2)
items.description: Refried beans with seasoned shredded beef, bell pepper and egg rolled in a flour tortilla

items.name: Chile Colorado Burritos (2)
items.description: Refried beans with our home-made chile colorado wrapped in a flour tortilla, topped with a little a more chile colorado

items.name: Shredded Beef Burritos
items.description: Our seasoned shredded beef with a touch of refried beans rolled in a flour tortilla, topped with salsa espanola

items.name: Two Carne Asada Burritos
items.description: Grilled top sirloin tips with refried beans, rice and pico de gallo

items.name: Two Burritos Ahogados
items.description: Your choice of shredded beef or chile verde burritos smothered in chile colorado sauce and melted cheese

items.name: Traditional Tostadas
items.description: Two crisp corn tortillas topped with refried beans, your choice of shredded beef or chicken, lettuce, sauce, cheese, tomatoes, sour cream and black olives

items.name: Guacamole Tostadas
items.description: A touch of refried beans with our fresh guacamole on two crisp corn tortillas, garnished with lettuce, sauce, cheese, tomatoes, sour cream and black olives

items.name: Tostadas De Machaca
items.description: Two crisp corn tortillas topped with refried beans, shredded beef with egg, adorned with lettuce, sauce, cheese, sour cream and black olives

items.name: Para Los Ninos
items.description: 12 And Under

items.name: One Beef, Chicken Or Bean Taco
Homemade Sopapillas
items.description: Golden fried fritters topped with cinnamon, sugar and honey

items.name: Home Made Flan
items.description: Mexican caramel custard

items.name: Xango Cheese Cake
items.description: A fried cream cheese pastry

items.name: Fried Ice Cream
items.description: A flour tortilla filled with vanilla ice cream, shredded coconut, cinnamon and sugar; fried to a golden brown

items.name: Pan De Tres Leches
items.description: A moist vanilla and milk cake

items.name: Arroz Con Leche
items.description: Homemade mexican style rice pudding
